projects.title: umd.io
projects.blurb: An API created by UMD students.

projects.title: 2048 - iOS
projects.blurb: A take on the game 2048 on iOS.
projects.description: A take on the game 2048 on iOS. This version allows for generalized board sizes, like 2x2, 4x4, 5x5, and up to nxn.

projects.title: Spyfall
projects.blurb: A take on the table-top game Spyfall.
projects.description: A take on the table-top game of Spyfall. This version allows for custom locations to be entered and used

projects.title: AsteriOS
projects.blurb: A 2D Space-Shooter game inspired by Asteroids.
